## Attach packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)

```

## Find derivatives using R

```{r}
# Define expression
fx <- expression(x^2)
pa <- expression(2*(3*a + 2)^4 - 5)

# Compute derivative
df_dx <- D(expr = fx, name = "x")
df_dx

dp_da <- D(expr = pa, name = "a")
dp_da

# Evaluate at x = 3
x <- 3
eval(df_dx)

a <- 1.2
eval(dp_da)
```
